originalText.text: I will be a returning patient. The whole staff was extremely personable and professional. Dr. Shay was kind and supportive as I navigated some nervous energy about the exam. I left feeling empowered and so relieved. I highly recommend.

text.text: I will be a returning patient. The whole staff was extremely personable and professional. Dr. Shay was kind and supportive as I navigated some nervous energy about the exam. I left feeling empowered and so relieved. I highly recommend.

originalText.text: I’m pregnant for the first time and my husband and I were so overwhelmed and worried. I visited Dr. Shay twice and each time I left feeling heard, safe, and filled with excitement. Everyone who works at this clinic cares so much about their patients, and the service is seamless and easy. I cannot recommend them enough! As a mama to be you need support and care, and that’s exactly what they provide.

originalText.text: This office is very professional, caring understanding , Doctor Shay is one of the best doctors I've seen  He breaks things down clearly if you don't understand and makes you feel comfortable. And gets positive answers to why it's important to do tests. I'm very happy to be at this doctor's office. And will recommend it to others.....

originalText.text: My first time visit went well. I was greeted by friendly front desk staff. The Dr. Amir Shay was very friendly and knowledgeable as well as his assisting staff. I appreciate you all making me feel welcomed and at ease about my situation. Everything turned out great. Place is also pleasant.

originalText.text: Dr. Shay is incredibly friendly and caring, and Assistant Rose is exceptionally helpful. The facility is consistently clean, making each visit enjoyable. I highly recommend their services.
